import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-projects', templateUrl: './projects.component.html', styleUrls: ['./projects.component.css'] }) export class ProjectsComponent { featuredExpanded = false; featuredProject = { name: "Dynamic HRMS Management System", description: `A next-gen HR automation platform that streamlines attendance, payroll, leave, recruitment, and performance under one unified system. Designed for enterprise clients, it syncs real-time data between HR, Payroll, and Management modules. It features policy-based payroll computation, advanced leave logic (including UAE compliance), department-level analytics, and workflow approvals â€” delivering a seamless employee lifecycle experience.`, techStack: ["Angular", "PHP", "MySQL", "CodeIgniter"], image: "assets/projects/hrms.jpg", link: "#" }; projects = [ { name: "UbiCRM â€” Customer Relationship Management", description: `A CRM platform for managing leads, deals, and client relationships efficiently with automation, analytics, and real-time insights.`, techStack: ["Angular 17", "AdonisJS", "MySQL", "Highcharts.js"], image: "assets/projects/crm.jpg", link: "#", expanded: false }, { name: "Organization Management System", description: `A scalable platform managing onboarding, subscriptions, and approval workflows for 3000+ organizations, improving administrative efficiency.`, techStack: ["AngularJS", "PHP (CodeIgniter)", "MySQL"], image: "assets/projects/organization.jpg", link: "#", expanded: false } ]; toggleExpand(project: any) { project.expanded = !project.expanded; } }
